title: Global chip stocks from Nvidia to ASML fall on geopolitics, Trump comments
content: Global chip stocks fell sharply with ASML, Nvidia and TSMC hit amid reports of tighter export restrictions from the U.S. and comments from Donald Trump.
summary: Global chip stocks fell sharply with ASML, Nvidia and TSMC hit amid reports of tighter export restrictions from the U.S. and comments from Donald Trump.

title: Biden tests positive for Covid, cancels speech in Las Vegas
content: Biden, who was delivering speeches in Las Vegas, "is experiencing mild symptoms," White House press secretary Karine Jean-Pierre said.

title: Here's why international buyers are pulling way back from the U.S. housing market

title: This 28-year-old raised $20 million for his mental health startup. His No. 1 advice? 'Be a bit delusional'
